Sentencas: A thin layer of doped lanthanum chromite on ferritic steel may act as a protective coating to mitigate the Cr volatility problems and facilitate the use of metallic inter I connect in solid oxide fuel cells operated at intermediate temperatures.
Titulo: LaCrO3-based coatings on ferritic stainless steel for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: In this paper, the LaCrO3 thin film was successfully synthesized on a ferritic stainless steel substrate by two approaches, i.e. reactive formation and sol-gel processing.
Titulo: LaCrO3-based coatings on ferritic stainless steel for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: The coating structures and surface morphologies were analyzed using X-ray diffraction and scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: LaCrO3-based coatings on ferritic stainless steel for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: After isothermal oxidation at 850 T for 100 h in air, the electrical resistance of the sol-gel coated samples remained very low, as compared to that of the uncoated sample after similar thermal exposure.
Titulo: LaCrO3-based coatings on ferritic stainless steel for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: The sol-gel coating also provided effective protection for the interconnect steel during oxidation of twelve 100-h cycles at 800 degreesC in air, whereas significant spallation and weight loss were observed for the uncoated steel.
Titulo: LaCrO3-based coatings on ferritic stainless steel for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: The two coating processes (i.e. reactive formation and sol-gel processing) were compared and their advantages and drawbacks were outlined.
Titulo: LaCrO3-based coatings on ferritic stainless steel for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications
LaCrO3-based coatings on ferritic stainless steel for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications
